title: Dad 'stabbed to death' hours after bizarre Facebook post declaring: 'I am dead to you'
text:
The body of Dougie Anderson was found early yesterday in a flat after an apparent domestic incident Share Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
A man has been found allegedly stabbed to death after making a bizarre Facebook post in which he hinted at an altercation, saying: "I am dead to you.” 
Friends Dougie Anderson have claimed he was stabbed after his body was found in the early hours of yesterday morning in a flat after an ­apparent domestic incident. 
Officers were called to an address at Dunnock Park in Muirton, Perth, Scotland after the alarm was raised. 
Police sealed the area off and said they were treating the death as “unexplained”, the Daily Record reports. Officers from Police Scotland cordoned off the scene at Dunnock Park in the Muirton area of Perth (Photo: Perthshire Picture Agency) Police at the scene in Perth (Photo: Perthshire Picture Agency) Police at the scene in Perth (Photo: Perthshire Picture Agency) 
Married dad Dougie worked for Perth Radio Taxis. 
The firm’s owner Sandy Smith said: “It’s a ­delicate situation as he had a wife and children so we don’t want to make any comment.”
